name: Click To Survive (DaxoDax)
description:
The main story is to survive under some difficult conditions and even under that conditions develop your community to get bigger cities and bigger population.

The project was created in 5 days period during Unity education at PISMO Novska

Programer : Davor Vezmar

Art: Davor Vezmar

Mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski

Update: 1.0
